title: Paras Healthcare Limited Strengthens Cancer Care in Jharkhand with State-of-the-Art Radiation Facility
summary: Paras Healthcare Limited has enhanced cancer treatment capabilities in Jharkhand by establishing a modern radiation therapy facility at their Ranchi unit, marking a significant improvement in regional healthcare infrastructure.
content:
Paras Healthcare Limited has taken a major step forward in improving cancer care access in Jharkhand with the inauguration of a new radiation therapy facility at their Ranchi hospital. The state-of-the-art center is equipped with advanced technology to provide comprehensive cancer treatment services to patients in the region.

The facility aims to address the growing need for specialized cancer care in Jharkhand and neighboring states, reducing the necessity for patients to travel to metropolitan cities for treatment. This development represents a significant enhancement of healthcare infrastructure in Eastern India.

source.title: Paras Healthcare Limited Strengthens Cancer Care in Jharkhand with State-of-the-Art Radiation Facility at Ranchi Unit

markdown_content:
## New Cancer Treatment Facility

Paras Healthcare Limited has taken a major step forward in improving cancer care access in Jharkhand with the inauguration of a new radiation therapy facility at their Ranchi hospital. The state-of-the-art center is equipped with advanced technology to provide comprehensive cancer treatment services to patients in the region.

The facility aims to address the growing need for specialized cancer care in Jharkhand and neighboring states, reducing the necessity for patients to travel to metropolitan cities for treatment. This development represents a significant enhancement of healthcare infrastructure in Eastern India.
